comment: Lots of spice, heavy tastes of cinnamon, clove, and honey suckle.

Hot hot hot... But what else do you expect from a 3 year old 120+ proof whiskey? The smell is sweet, like caramel. A very quick floral and citrus note on the palate, followed by an overwhelming synthetic cinnamon flavor (think, red hots). The cinnamon slowly fades into an oily, syrupy, maple finish.
Nice complex flavors with caramel notes at the start, but a sharp finish.
